mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan_master SET plan_party_seq = #{planPartySeq}, plan_start_dt = #{planStartDt}, plan_start_time = #{planStartTime}, plan_title = #{planTitle}, plan_contents = #{planContents}
mapper.update: UPDATE plan_master SET plan_completed = 2 WHERE plan_seq = #{planSeq} AND plan_completed = 1
mapper.select: SELECT A.plan_seq AS planSeq, A.plan_party_seq AS planPartySeq, A.plan_start_dt AS planStartDt, A.plan_start_time AS planStartTime, A.plan_completed AS planCompleted, B.CD_GB_NM AS cdNm, A.plan_title AS planTitle, A.plan_contents AS planContents FROM plan_master A JOIN common_cd B ON A.plan_completed = B.cd_gb WHERE plan_party_seq = #{planPartySeq} AND B.cd_main = 'PC'

SELECT A.plan_seq AS planSeq, A.plan_party_seq AS planPartySeq, A.plan_start_dt AS planStartDt, A.plan_start_time AS planStartTime, A.plan_completed AS planCompleted, B.CD_GB_NM AS cdNm, A.plan_title AS planTitle, A.plan_contents AS planContents FROM plan_master A JOIN common_cd B ON A.plan_completed = B.cd_gb WHERE plan_seq = #{planSeq} AND B.cd_main = 'PC'
